sections.summary:
Hard-working, entry-level Office Assistant, looking to apply my education and experience to a job in Administration. Customer service-oriented
Administrative Assistant skilled in greeting patients, scheduling appointments and preparing patient charts.
Highlights
Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint
Detail oriented
Planning/coordinating
Critical thinker
Team leadership
Excellent research skills
Professional demeanor
Customer Service
Customer Satisfaction
Accomplishments
